headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KAPLAN, RICHARD S.

snippet: KAPLAN--Richard S.,87, magazine editor. Survived by wife, Julia; daughters, Susan Burkat and Nancy Kaplan; grandson, Daniel K. Rubin; brother, Howard C. Kaplan. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KAPLAN--Richard S.,87, magazine editor. Survived by wife, Julia; daughters, Susan Burkat and Nancy Kaplan; grandson, Daniel K. Rubin; brother, Howard C. Kaplan. 1/3
